com.sociam.android

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • com.sociam.android.MainActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.location.LocationListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener

    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.location.LocationListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener
    Main class for the application.

    This application has 4 activities in total and MeinActivity(this class) is main activity of the application. This class (activity) is firstly executed when a user open the application. The map will be loaded via Android google map API. Other data will be download from the server.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    yukki

    • Method Detail

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Method that will read once this activity is not visible.

        Once the activity is not visible, the location manager will stop since it cost battery power.

        Overrides:
        onStop in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • reloadData

        public void reloadData()
        Method that reloads markers' data from server

        Method that manage to reload data from the server. It clear all the markers on the map, then obtain new data from the server.

      • setMyLocationManager

        public void setMyLocationManager()
        Method that invokes loading 'LocationManager'

        The location strategy is a bit tricky in android. This methods tries to use accurate position as much as possible 1. set up current location using LocationManager 2.just in case, if current location is not available to get latest best location. 3.invokes listeners from GPS and Network

      • getData

        public java.lang.String getData(int type)
        Method that gets data from the server.
        Parameters:
        type - Potential values are 0:crime 1:messages 2:replymessages
        Returns:
        String the response which contains sequence of data from the server.

      • isFinishReplyUpdate

        public boolean isFinishReplyUpdate()
        Return whether the async task to get reply messages is finished or not
        Returns:
        'ture' if the task is finished 'false' the task is still processing.

      • getDistanceFromHere

        public void getDistanceFromHere(android.location.Location userloc,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Crime> crimelist)
        Helper function for onCreate(). It compute distance between current position of user and each crime. This list will be used for navigation drawer.
        Parameters:
        userloc - the user location
        crimelist - a list of crime
